revised_title: Magnetic Survey of the Fortieth Parallel in North America
tldr: This article presents the results of a magnetic survey conducted along the 40th parallel in North America, from the Atlantic Ocean to the Great Salt Lake, Utah. The survey aimed to observe the three magnetic elements: dip, intensity, and declination. The instruments used were provided by Owens College, Manchester. The survey aimed to fill the gap in magnetic observations in the region between the Mexican and North American Boundary Commission lines.
